title: Suh Burb: Early Beta Tech Demo
creator: Chris Bradel

extendedInfo.description: Welcome! A few years ago, I set out to create a perfect platforming engine. If you've played a Sonic game, or FancyPants, you'll have an idea of what I mean. I call it 'Momentum Platforming.'This technically is the fourth game in the series, and I'm attempting to bring all three of the previous storylines together in a whole new rewritten engine for GameMaker: Studio.Why should you give this game a try?A mix of a super smooth platforming, parkour experience and a laugh-inducing storyline, will keep you playing for whole minutes! -Until the end of the current demo.This is still a very very early demo, but I wanted to get it out to be able to get some feedback on its roots.General controls are stated in the first room of the demo, and there's a nice selection of places to play around in for now.Give it a try, and let me know what you think of it!Thanks,ChrisExtra Media:These will give you a good idea of what you'll find here.YouTube Playlist of Demo Videos of this:http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLL2H4-Mxh2h_OaOuX-7u32hnCIGwH6dQgDemo Video of "Suh Burb":http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WxX88KJ9exYDemo Video of "Suh Burb 2":http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XVMC0Eebk4E

reviews.title: This is pretty fun
reviews.comment: All it needs is a menu system, and better touch controls. Climbing even small slopes is super hard w/o momentum.   Please keep it up, this is a great concept!
reviews.author: David Hart

reviews.title: Very goog
reviews.comment: Its a really fun game good mechanics addictive game but u need to work on the controls when u wall jump u need perfect rhythm but other y s a great game
reviews.author: Nathan Sagrero
